item.title: @elonmusk: Obama deported 2.7-3.1 million people and 75% of them were non judicial which means these people nev...
item.description: Obama deported 2.7-3.1 million people and 75% of them were non judicial which means these people never went before a judge for due process. Where were the organized protests, riots, doxxing of ICR agents and attacks? Nowhere. Why? This isnâ€™t about immigration. This is about a Marxist revolution.

item.title: @elonmusk: FILIBUSTER: Democrats plan to undo 100% of the DOGE cuts and massively increase spending when they w...
item.description: FILIBUSTER: Democrats plan to undo 100% of the DOGE cuts and massively increase spending when they win the midterms. They now have the votes to eliminate the filibuster as they tried and failed to do in 2022. There is ZERO reason Leader Thune shouldn't eliminate or reform it now. h/t@Jules31415

item.title: @elonmusk: The biggest mistake the Trump admin is making right now is taking half measures. If Democrats get in...
item.description: The biggest mistake the Trump admin is making right now is taking half measures. If Democrats get into power again they will arrest and jail huge numbers of Republican politicians, media figures, voters etc. Half measures get you killed. Jennifer Welch and Jim Acosta should be arrested. The corrupt criminal Democrat party leaders need to be arrested and jailed. If you don't strike first and strike hard, you will lose the only opportunity you have to save yourself and save your voters from the inevitable communist purge.
